scripts.fix_deploy: node -e "console.log('Starting fix script...'); const models = require('./db/models'); const schema = 'airbnb_schema'; console.log('Setting path to: ' + schema); models.sequelize.query('SET search_path TO \"' + schema + '\", public;').then(() => { console.log('Search path set!'); models.sequelize.query('SELECT current_schema();').then((result) => { console.log('Current schema is:', result[0][0].current_schema); require('child_process').exec('npx sequelize-cli db:migrate', (err, stdout) => { if(err) console.log('Migration error:', err); else console.log(stdout); }); }); });"
